WorkGoal.name: WorkGoal
WorkGoal.description: Represents the components of a goal, such as its description and associated metrics.

ActualValue.description: The actual value of the WorkGoal metric. Applicable only to WorkGoal objects of Type: Metric.

ActualValueExternalUrl.description: Contains a URL that references WDC data synchronization for the actual value of a metric. Applicable only to WorkGoal objects of Type: Metric.

CompletionDate.description: The completion date of the goal. Note Field-level security limits access to only administrators and owners by default, and only they can complete a goal.

DueDate.description: The date the WorkGoal object is due (optional). Applicable only to WorkGoal objects of Type: Metric.

FlaggedAs.description: The progress of the WorkGoal object. Applicable only to WorkGoal objects of Type: Metric.

ImageUrl.description: The URL for the goal image. The image must be stored in Documents and set as externally available. Applicable only to WorkGoal objects of Type: Goal.

InitialValue.description: The initial value of the WorkGoal metric. Applicable only to WorkGoal objects of Type: Metric and MetricType: Progress or Percent.

IsKeyCompanyGoal.description: Used to indicate if the goal is a key company goal. Used for the Company Goal Showcase. Applicable only to WorkGoal objects of Type: Goal.

LastReferencedDate.description: The time stamp that indicates when the current user last viewed a record that is related to this goal.

LastSyncDate.description: The time stamp that indicates when the actual value was last synced with the associated metrics report.

LastViewedDate.description: The time stamp that indicates when the current user last viewed this goal.

MetricType.description: The type of metric that is represented. (See values in the following list). Applies only to WorkGoal objects of Type: Metric.

MetricTypeDataSource.description: Specifies how the metric (ActualValue and CurrentValue) is updated. Applies only to WorkGoal objects of Type: Goal and Metric.

Name.description: The name of the WorkGoal object. (Maximum length is 255.)

OverallStatus.description: The overall calculated status of the WorkGoal based on FlaggedAs and CompletionDate.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who owns the WorkGoal.

ParentId.description: Specifies the structural parent of the WorkGoal. For example, a goal that has a metric is represented by a WorkGoal of Type Metric, which has a parent of WorkGoal of Type Goal. Note The root and the parent must be set to the parent goal for any child metrics.

Progress.description: Read Only. The overall progress of the WorkGoal.

RootId.description: Specifies the structural root of the WorkGoal. For example, a goal that has a metric is represented by a WorkGoal of Type Metric, which has a root of WorkGoal of Type Goal.

State.description: The state of the WorkGoal object. Applies only to WorkGoal objects of Type: Metric.

TargetValue.description: The target value of the WorkGoal. Applies only to WorkGoal objects of Type: Metric.

Type.description: The type of the WorkGoal object, used to differentiate between the components of a goal. (This field is used to represent components of a goal such as its description and associated metrics.)

Weight.description: The weight of the goal or metric. The sum of the weights should equal 100%.
